items.title: Vodafone Idea begins 5G trials in Mumbai ahead of Holi launch
items.description: The trial phase allows select users to experience unlimited 5G data at no extra cost

items.title: Weekly Tactical Pick | Bajaj Auto: Why you should consider investing in this auto stock
items.description: Bajaj’s Auto rise in the EV space and strong export market make it a good bet now

items.title: Agrochemical exporters face new risk to earnings from Trump’s reciprocal tariffs
items.description: Inventory destocking and price erosion adversely impacted global agrochemical industry growth in 2024.

items.title: IRCTC: Why this journey offers value for money
items.description: IRCTC enjoys an envious position in the domestic travel and tourism industry, with its monopoly in railway ticketing, catering and packaged water business, and its affordable tourism packages

items.title: Pharma industry body seeks govt to consider tariff cut on US pharma imports to zero
items.description: The industry body, which represents large homegrown pharmaceutical companies that have significant exposure to US market, feels that reducing the tariffs on US imports wouldn't cost a lot to India, and may even convince Trump administration to offer relief on tariffs.

items.title: Cipla Global CEO says drug companies may have to gear up for distributed manufacturing network
items.description: 'We would like most of the manufacturing to be centric in locations where it is most economic. Looking at every country's ambition to be self sufficient and every country's ambition to be balanced from a tariff perspective or anything else, I actually see a little bit of a difference in the future of how (manufacturing) networks will operate,' said Umang Vohra, Global CEO and MD of Cipla

items.title: NPCI eyes AI-driven parking payments, moving beyond traditional RFID FASTag
items.description: NPCI is testing a system where cameras and AI read vehicle number plates to automatically debit FASTag accounts, with a proof of concept underway, NPCI chief Dilip Asbe told Moneycontrol.

items.title: Acme Solar wants to invest in nuclear energy, says CEO Nikhil Dhingra
items.description: Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman in her Budget for FY26 announced a National Nuclear Energy Mission, calling for private participation in the nuclear power sector
